statements: DELETE FROM tv_show_viewership_data WHERE show_name = 'Game of Thrones' AND viewership_count > 1000000;
DELETE FROM viewership WHERE viewer_name = 'John' AND age > 30
DELETE FROM TV_Show_Views WHERE viewer_id = 456 AND viewer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM TV_Show_Views WHERE show_id = 1 AND viewer_id = 101;
DELETE FROM TV_Show_Views WHERE viewer_name = 'John Smith' AND viewing_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Viewership WHERE viewer_id = 5 AND show_id = 3;
DELETE FROM Viewers WHERE viewer_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM Viewers WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'M'
